summary: A new shield for the Nightingale set textured by me.
descriptionHtml:
The Nightingale Shield has the same states as a daedric shield. It can be found in the Nightingale Hall. It has an enchantment of waterwalking. Finally it requires no DLC. 
I would like to thank U653748 for making the mesh of the shield and putting it up as a modders resource. 
P.S The title image says the shield is a heavy piece however it is really light armour.
author: MJAB98
